level.heading: Governing law.
level.text: The law of the District shall govern the:
Internal affairs of a limited cooperative association; and
Liability of a member as member and a director as director for the debts, obligations, or other liabilities of a limited cooperative association.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 107 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
